mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM SPORT_DATA_FB_OLD WHERE SPORT_AGAINST_INFO_ID=#{sportAgainstInfoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ORDER BY RELEASE_TIME ASC
mapper.insert: insert into SPORT_DATA_FB_OLD (SPORT_AGAINST_INFO_ID, SP_WIN, SP_DRAW, SP_FAIL, SP_TYPE, RELEASE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_TIME) values (#{sportAgainstInfoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{spWin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{spDraw,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{spFail,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{spType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update SPORT_DATA_FB_OLD
SPORT_AGAINST_INFO_ID = #{sportAgainstInfoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SP_WIN = #{spWin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SP_DRAW = #{spDraw,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SP_FAIL = #{spFail,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
